document.full_text: an 80-year-old woman and her 16-year-old grandson were rescued from their damaged home on sunday in the city of ishinomaki, nine days after the northeast was devastated by a massive earthquake and tsunami, nhk public tv said.
document.title: trapped tsunami victims ate yoghurt to stay alive
lines_and_colors: an 80-year-old woman and her 16-year-old grandson were rescued from their damaged home on sunday in the city of ishinomaki, nine days after the northeast was devastated by a massive earthquake and tsunami, nhk public tv said.
